mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.sale_id AS "sale.id", a.name AS "name", a.quantity AS "quantity", a.unit AS "unit", a.price AS "price", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN cl_sale b ON b.id = a.sale_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cl_sale_item( id, sale_id, name, quantity, unit, price, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{sale.id}, #{name}, #{quantity}, #{unit}, #{price}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cl_sale_item SET sale_id = #{sale.id}, name = #{name}, quantity = #{quantity}, unit = #{unit}, price = #{price}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
